Others: The Dallas Mavericks won against the Chicago Bulls with a score of 119-99.
Luka Doncic had 27 points, 13 assists, and 7 rebounds in the game.
Kyrie Irving had 17 points, 6 rebounds, and 2 assists in the game.
Doncic mentioned that it takes time to develop chemistry with a new player like Klay Thompson.
Thompson has been able to fit in well through their first eight games.
